Definition: The time to make a decision increases with the number and complexity of choices.
Application: Giảm CTA còn 1-2 trên hero section. Menu đơn giản hoặc hidden navigation. Loại bỏ sidebar distractions.
Pass_Criteria: CTA count above-fold <= 2
Anti_Pattern: >= 3 CTA cạnh tranh nhau trong hero section

Definition: The time to acquire a target is a function of the distance to and size of the target.
Application: CTA button lớn (min 48px height), contrast ratio >= 4.5:1, đặt trong thumb zone trên mobile. Padding đủ rộng cho touch target.
Pass_Criteria: CTA height >= 48px AND touch target >= 44x44px AND contrast ratio >= 4.5:1
Anti_Pattern: CTA nhỏ < 36px hoặc đặt xa tầm thumb reach trên mobile

Definition: 80% of effects come from 20% of causes.
Application: Tập trung 20% nội dung quan trọng nhất above-fold: value proposition + primary CTA. Phần còn lại supporting content below-fold.
Pass_Criteria: Above-fold chứa: 1 headline (value prop) + 1 primary CTA + 1 supporting visual
Anti_Pattern: Above-fold chứa quá nhiều info hoặc thiếu CTA

Definition: Users prefer your site to work the same way as all the other sites they already know.
Application: Logo top-left (clickable → homepage), navigation top-right, CTA button nổi bật nhất ở góc phải. Footer chứa links chuẩn.
Pass_Criteria: Logo position = top-left AND nav position = top/top-right AND footer contains standard links
Anti_Pattern: Layout phi truyền thống gây confused navigation
Expected_Impact: Tăng familiarity và giảm learning curve 50%

Definition: The tendency to approach a goal increases with proximity to the goal.
Application: Thêm progress bar cho form multi-step (3+ fields). Hiển thị step X/Y. Micro-celebration khi complete mỗi step.
Pass_Criteria: Form > 3 fields có progress indicator hiển thị rõ current step / total steps
Anti_Pattern: Form dài không có progress indicator

Definition: The average person can keep 7 (±2) items in working memory.
Application: Chunking navigation menu: tối đa 7±2 items ở top-level. Dùng dropdown/mega menu cho sub-items. Group related actions.
Pass_Criteria: Top-level nav items <= 9 AND sử dụng grouping nếu > 7 items
Anti_Pattern: Menu > 9 items không có grouping hoặc hierarchy

Definition: Objects that are near or proximate to each other tend to be grouped together.
Application: Spacing giữa related elements < spacing giữa unrelated elements. Dùng whitespace tạo visual groups. Section dividers rõ ràng.
Pass_Criteria: Related items spacing ratio: intra-group spacing < 50% of inter-group spacing
Anti_Pattern: Spacing đồng đều giữa mọi elements khiến không phân biệt được groups

Definition: Design system thống nhất: cùng 1 action = cùng 1 style. Internal + external consistency.
Application: Buttons cùng loại → cùng style/size/color. Icons từ 1 bộ duy nhất (Heroicons HOẶC Lucide). Spacing theo scale cố định (4px base).
Pass_Criteria: Same action type = same visual treatment across all pages AND single icon library used
Anti_Pattern: Mix nhiều icon libraries hoặc inconsistent button styles

Definition: Users best remember the first and last items in a series.
Application: Đặt info quan trọng nhất ở vị trí đầu và cuối của list/navigation. Primary actions ở đầu hoặc cuối toolbar.
Pass_Criteria: Key info/actions at position 1 AND last position in any list/nav
Anti_Pattern: Info quan trọng bị chôn ở giữa list

Definition: Be liberal in what you accept and conservative in what you send.
Application: Forms accept varied input formats (phone: 0901234567 hoặc +84901234567). Auto-format. Inline validation thay vì block submit. Clear error messages.
Pass_Criteria: Form accepts >= 2 formats cho phone/date fields AND shows inline validation AND error messages specific (not generic)
Anti_Pattern: Form reject valid input hoặc chỉ show generic error 'Invalid input'

Definition: The time to acquire a target is a function of the distance to and size of the target.
Application: Tất cả interactive elements >= 44×44px touch target. Primary actions trong thumb zone (bottom 1/3 screen). Avoid top corners cho frequent actions.
Pass_Criteria: All interactive elements >= 44×44px AND primary actions within bottom 40% of screen
Anti_Pattern: Touch targets < 44px hoặc critical actions ở top corners

Definition: Productivity soars when computer and users interact at pace <400ms.
Application: Loading feedback appear < 400ms. Skeleton screens cho content loading. Optimistic UI updates. Haptic feedback cho actions.
Pass_Criteria: Loading indicator appears within 400ms of user action AND skeleton screens for content > 1s load time
Anti_Pattern: Blank screen trong lúc loading hoặc no feedback > 400ms

Definition: Elements sharing an area with clearly defined boundary are perceived as groups.
Application: Group related screens bằng tabs/cards. Dùng container/card boundaries rõ ràng. Bottom tab bar cho main sections. Card-based layout cho related content.
Pass_Criteria: Related content shares visual container (card/section) AND main navigation uses bottom tabs (<= 5)
Anti_Pattern: Related content không có visual boundary phân biệt

Definition: Users often perceive aesthetically pleasing design as more usable.
Application: Visual polish: consistent border-radius / shadow depth / spacing. Smooth animations (ease-out). Cohesive color palette. High-quality imagery.
Pass_Criteria: UI consistency score > 85% (border-radius / shadow / spacing nhất quán) AND animations ease-out curve
Anti_Pattern: Inconsistent styling: mixed border-radius / random shadows / jarring animations

Definition: People judge experience based on how they felt at peak and end.
Application: Success screens sau key actions (checkout / signup / form submit). Celebration micro-animations. Positive messaging ở session end.
Pass_Criteria: Key flows (signup / checkout / submit) kết thúc bằng success screen với positive messaging
Anti_Pattern: Flow kết thúc abruptly không có confirmation hoặc success state

Definition: Similar elements are perceived as part of the same group.
Application: Controls và UI elements giữ consistent visual theme. Icons cùng style (filled/outlined/pixel). Color coding nhất quán cho item types.
Pass_Criteria: Icon style uniform across all controls AND color coding consistent cho cùng item category
Anti_Pattern: Mix icon styles (filled + outlined + emoji) trong cùng 1 context

Definition: Aesthetically pleasing design perceived as more usable.
Application: Art style immersive và nhất quán. HUD minimal — không clutter. UI elements blend với game aesthetic. Polish animations.
Pass_Criteria: HUD coverage <= 15% total screen area AND UI style matches game art direction
Anti_Pattern: HUD chiếm > 20% screen hoặc UI style clash với game art

Definition: When multiple similar objects present — the different one is most remembered.
Application: Highlight special items (power-ups / rare drops) bằng distinct color + size + glow animation. Important notifications khác biệt rõ.
Pass_Criteria: Important items có >= 2 visual differentiators (color AND size hoặc animation)
Anti_Pattern: Tất cả items trông giống nhau — không distinguish được important ones

Definition: Decision time increases with number and complexity of choices.
Application: In-game menus đơn giản: radial menus / quick-select wheels. Max 8 options per menu level. Shortcuts cho frequent actions.
Pass_Criteria: In-game menu options <= 8 per level AND accessible trong <= 2 taps/clicks
Anti_Pattern: Complex nested menus > 10 items phá game flow

Definition: Near objects grouped together.
Application: HUD elements clustered ở screen edges. Health/mana top-left. Minimap top/bottom-right. Action bar bottom-center. Clear spacing giữa HUD groups.
Pass_Criteria: HUD groups positioned ở screen periphery (edges/corners) AND spacing giữa groups >= 40px
Anti_Pattern: HUD elements scattered random across screen

Definition: The total mental resources needed to understand and interact with an interface.
Application: Data visualization dùng progressive disclosure. Summary first → drill-down on demand. Limit metrics visible simultaneously <= 7.
Pass_Criteria: Default view shows <= 7 key metrics AND drill-down available on interaction
Anti_Pattern: > 12 metrics hiển thị đồng thời không grouping

Definition: People interpret complex images as simplest form possible.
Application: Charts/graphs dùng clean simple forms. Avoid 3D charts khi 2D đủ. Minimal decorative elements. Clear data labels.
Pass_Criteria: Charts use 2D forms (no 3D unless spatial data) AND data labels present AND minimal chartjunk
Anti_Pattern: 3D pie charts / decorative gradients on data viz / missing labels

Definition: Focusing attention only on stimuli related to current goals.
Application: Filtering / search prominent. Active filters visible. Highlight current context. Dim/fade irrelevant data khi filtering.
Pass_Criteria: Filter/search visible without scrolling AND active filters displayed AND filtered-out data visually dimmed
Anti_Pattern: No filtering capability hoặc active filters hidden

Definition: People remember uncompleted tasks better than completed ones.
Application: Hiển thị incomplete tasks / progress. Onboarding checklist với completion %. Save draft states. Resume-where-left-off.
Pass_Criteria: Onboarding có progress indicator AND draft auto-save AND 'continue where you left off' feature
Anti_Pattern: No progress tracking cho multi-step workflows

Definition: Every system has inherent complexity that cannot be removed — only moved.
Application: Move complexity from user to system. Smart defaults. Auto-detect settings. Progressive disclosure cho advanced options.
Pass_Criteria: Advanced options hidden by default AND smart defaults pre-filled AND auto-detection where possible
Anti_Pattern: Force users configure complex settings upfront before using core feature

Definition: Among equally valid options — choose the simplest.
Application: Remove unnecessary UI elements. Each screen serves 1 primary purpose. Eliminate redundant actions. Simplify copy.
Pass_Criteria: Each screen has 1 clear primary action AND no redundant paths to same action
Anti_Pattern: Screen có > 3 equal-weight CTAs hoặc duplicate functionality

Definition: Users never read manuals — they start using software immediately.
Application: Design for learn-by-doing. Inline hints / tooltips. Interactive onboarding tours. Undo instead of confirmation dialogs.
Pass_Criteria: First-time user can complete core task without reading docs AND undo available for destructive actions
Anti_Pattern: Require mandatory tutorial before usage hoặc no undo for critical actions

Definition: Tasks inflate to fill available time.
Application: Set reasonable defaults cho deadlines. Show time estimates. Break large tasks into sub-tasks với individual deadlines.
Pass_Criteria: Time estimates shown for complex tasks AND large tasks auto-suggest breakdown
Anti_Pattern: Unbounded tasks without time guidance

Definition: Temporarily holds and manipulates information for tasks.
Application: Persistent cart indicator (item count). Recently viewed products. Comparison tối đa 3-4 items. Breadcrumb navigation.
Pass_Criteria: Cart indicator always visible AND recently viewed accessible AND comparison <= 4 items
Anti_Pattern: Cart hidden / no breadcrumbs / comparison > 5 items overwhelming

Definition: People overwhelmed when presented with large number of options.
Application: Faceted filtering. Sort options. 'Recommended for you' section. Limit products per page (12-24). Category hierarchy clear.
Pass_Criteria: Products per page <= 24 AND faceted filters available AND sort options >= 3 AND recommended section present
Anti_Pattern: > 50 products per page without filtering hoặc overwhelming grid

Definition: Compressed model of what we think we know about how a system works.
Application: Checkout flow matches user expectations: Cart → Shipping → Payment → Confirmation. Standard e-commerce patterns. Familiar icons.
Pass_Criteria: Checkout follows standard sequential flow AND uses familiar icons (cart/lock/checkmark)
Anti_Pattern: Non-standard checkout flow confusing users

Definition: Mental state of full immersion and energized focus.
Application: Smooth transitions between pages. No interrupting popups during checkout. Lazy loading images. Instant search results.
Pass_Criteria: No modal popups during checkout AND page transitions < 300ms AND search shows results within 500ms
Anti_Pattern: Popup ads during checkout hoặc jarring page reloads

Definition: Visually connected elements perceived as more related.
Application: Product cards: image + title + price + rating visually connected trong 1 card boundary. Related products section clearly bounded.
Pass_Criteria: Product info (image/title/price/rating) within single visual container AND related products in distinct section
Anti_Pattern: Product info scattered / price separated from product image

Definition: Decision time increases with choices.
Application: Limit main menu items. Clear primary action per screen. Simplified appointment booking (3 steps max). Emergency contact always accessible.
Pass_Criteria: Main navigation <= 5 items AND booking flow <= 3 steps AND emergency button always visible
Anti_Pattern: Complex menus > 7 items hoặc booking flow > 5 steps

Definition: Mental resources for interface interaction.
Application: Medical info dùng plain language. Visual indicators (color-coded severity). Progressive disclosure cho detailed medical data.
Pass_Criteria: Medical terms accompanied by plain-language explanation AND severity color-coded (green/yellow/red) AND detail on-demand
Anti_Pattern: Dense medical jargon without explanation hoặc no visual severity indicators

Definition: Beautiful = perceived more usable.
Application: Calming color palette (blues/greens). Clean typography. Ample whitespace. No visual clutter. Rounded corners = friendly feel.
Pass_Criteria: Color palette uses calming tones AND whitespace >= 30% screen AND no visual clutter in critical screens
Anti_Pattern: Harsh colors (bright red for non-emergency) hoặc cluttered interface

Definition: Users prefer familiar patterns.
Application: Standard banking layout: account overview → transactions → transfer. Familiar financial icons. Security indicators consistent.
Pass_Criteria: Account overview as default screen AND transactions list standard layout AND security indicators (lock icon / https badge) visible
Anti_Pattern: Non-standard financial layout confusing users about money-related actions

Definition: <400ms interaction pace.
Application: Transaction confirmation < 200ms visual feedback. Real-time balance updates. Skeleton loading cho account data. Optimistic UI cho transfers.
Pass_Criteria: Transaction feedback < 200ms AND balance update real-time AND skeleton loading for data fetch
Anti_Pattern: Slow balance updates hoặc no feedback during transaction processing

Definition: Different items remembered most.
Application: Highlight key concepts / vocabulary. Important dates visually distinct. Progress milestones celebrated. Quiz answers clearly differentiated.
Pass_Criteria: Key concepts highlighted (bold/color/icon) AND progress milestones have celebration animation AND quiz options visually distinct
Anti_Pattern: All content same visual weight — nothing stands out

Definition: Motivation increases near goal completion.
Application: Course progress bar always visible. Lesson completion indicators. Streak counters. Near-completion encouragement messages.
Pass_Criteria: Course progress bar visible AND completion % shown AND streak counter present AND encouragement at > 80% progress
Anti_Pattern: No progress tracking hoặc completion feels undefined

Definition: Breaking info into meaningful groups.
Application: Lessons broken into 5-10 min segments. Topics grouped by theme/module. Vocabulary in meaningful categories. Quiz questions chunked.
Pass_Criteria: Lesson segments <= 10 min AND topics grouped by theme AND quiz <= 10 questions per session
Anti_Pattern: Hour-long undivided lessons hoặc 50-question quizzes

Definition: Target acquisition = f(distance / size).
Application: Breakpoint-aware touch targets: mobile >= 48px / tablet >= 44px / desktop >= 36px. CTA scales proportionally. Navigation adapts to device.
Pass_Criteria: Touch targets: mobile >= 48px / tablet >= 44px / desktop clickable areas >= 36px AND CTA visible at all breakpoints
Anti_Pattern: Fixed-size touch targets too small on mobile hoặc too large on desktop

Definition: Familiar patterns preferred.
Application: Hamburger menu on mobile (widely understood). Tab bar for mobile apps. Sidebar for desktop. Standard responsive patterns.
Pass_Criteria: Mobile: hamburger/bottom nav AND Tablet: adapted layout AND Desktop: full nav visible AND breakpoints: 375/768/1024/1440px
Anti_Pattern: Same navigation pattern forced across all breakpoints

Definition: Mental resources for understanding.
Application: Reduce content per viewport on smaller screens. Priority-based content display. Hide non-essential elements on mobile. Lazy load below-fold.
Pass_Criteria: Mobile shows priority content first AND non-essential elements hidden or collapsed AND images lazy-loaded below-fold
Anti_Pattern: Cramming desktop content into mobile viewport without prioritization

Definition: Focus on goal-related stimuli.
Application: Menu categories prominent. Photos high-quality và appetizing. Order button always visible. Dietary filters (vegetarian/vegan/allergen) easy to find.
Pass_Criteria: Menu categories visible AND food photos present AND order/booking CTA sticky AND dietary filters accessible within 1 tap
Anti_Pattern: No food photos hoặc categories hidden hoặc order button hard to find

Definition: Simplest interpretation preferred.
Application: Property cards: clean layout với 1 hero photo + key info (price/beds/baths/sqft). Map view simple markers. Filter interface clean.
Pass_Criteria: Property card shows hero image + price + key features (beds/baths/area) AND map markers clear AND filter interface <= 8 visible options
Anti_Pattern: Cluttered property cards với too much info hoặc complex map overlays

Definition: Beautiful = usable.
Application: Premium materials feel: subtle shadows + refined typography + generous whitespace. Gold/black accents. High-res imagery. Slow elegant animations.
Pass_Criteria: Typography: serif heading font AND whitespace >= 40% AND animations duration 300-500ms AND image quality >= 2x retina
Anti_Pattern: Cheap-looking design: low-res images / system fonts / cramped spacing

Definition: Full immersion state.
Application: Zero-interruption during gameplay. HUD fade khi not needed. Seamless level transitions. Audio-visual feedback synchronized.
Pass_Criteria: No popup interruptions during active gameplay AND HUD auto-fades after 3s inactivity AND transitions smooth (no loading screens > 2s)
Anti_Pattern: Popup ads/notifications during gameplay hoặc jarring loading screens
